entry.title: 3M Scotch 355-72X50-CLR - Box Sealing Tape 355 in Clear (72 mm x 50 m) 7000123624
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Sealing Tapes
Price: 24.22

[shortdesc]

Scotch(R) Box Sealing Tape 355 Clear, 72 mm x 50 m, 6 per inner box 24 per case Bulk

  • Scotch Box Sealing Tape 355 offers the highest edge tear and split resistance of all polyester backed box sealing tapes by 3M
  • It uses a rubber resin adhesive on a polyester backing that is resistant to abrasion, moisture and scuffing.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Length 50m
    Width 72mm
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Sealing Tapes

    Product Information

  • Polyester backing is abrasion and nick resistant
  • Can be custom printed to help provide branding or security
  • Unwinds easily
  • Complies with ASTM D1974-92 and ASTM D5486 Type III
  • Meets CID A-A-1684B
  • Water-resistant per ASTM D5570

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal for general industrial, food and beverage, medical and pharmaceutical, paper, print, electronics and distribution industries
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 1274.00

[shortdesc]

3M Extreme Sealing Tape, 4411B, black, 24 in x 36 yd

  • 3M™ Extreme Sealing Tape 4411B is a black, highly conformable, single-sided, pressure sensitive acrylic adhesive tape with a high performance ionomer backing
  • It is an ideal solution for creating a watertight seal
  • It conforms over fasteners, seams, joints, holes, and gaps to ensure a long-lasting seal on a variety of substrates.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Black, 0.040 in (1.0 mm) thick tape is designed for difficult sealing applications
  • Sticks on contact to many metals, plastics, and other hard-to-stick-to surfaces
  • Provides immediate seal with no wait time or oozing associated with liquid sealants
  • Tough, yet flexible clear ionomer backing is abrasion resistant and instantly paintable
  • Acrylic adhesive provides excellent sealing qualities and good outdoor durability
    		•
